thread.title: G-Technology® Continues To Embrace Creative Pros At The 2015 PhotoPlus Expo

author: cbs8
title: G-Technology® Continues To Embrace Creative Pros At The 2015 PhotoPlus Expo
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE G-Technology
Show-Goers Can Visit the G-Technology Booth and Check Out Top-of-the-Line Solutions for Any Workflow, Whether It's for Shooting in the Sky, on the Ground or in the Studio
NEW YORK , Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- 2015 PhotoPlus Expo (Booth #149) -- G-Technology , the preferred brand for delivering high-quality, high-performance storage solutions for the professional content creation market, is bringing the action to PhotoPlus Expo 2015 by showcasing its latest products in some of the most extreme creative endeavors from world-renowned photographers and G-TEAM members Vincent Laforet and Lucas Gilman .
WHO: G-Technology at PhotoPlus Expo
WHERE: Javits Convention Center, New York , Booth #149
WHEN: Thursday, Oct. 22 – Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015
WHAT:
EVOLUTION SERIES SHOWCASE: The choice for storing, transferring, editing and distributing content, the Evolution Series makes any workflow simpler, better and faster. Recently introduced products, including the ev Series Reader, RED MINI-MAG Edition, the G-DOCK ev Solo and G-SPEED Studio XL with two ev Series Bay Adapters, continue to round out the industry's most flexible storage solution ecosystem. FLY SKY HIGH WITH VINCENT LAFORET'S AIR PROJECT: Get up close to see Vincent's work that captured images of the world's greatest cities, including New York , from 10,000 feet in the sky and learn more about the G-Technology products that helped make it possible. GET IN ON THE GROUND ACTION WITH A LUCAS GILMAN PHOTO WALK: Join Red Bull Illume Image Quest finalist and G-TEAM member Lucas Gilman on an action-packed photo walk to capture a professional BMX rider, Corey Martinez , at DUMBO, Brooklyn Bridge. Learn more about what it takes to get these breathtaking shots and break into the G-Technology-sponsored 2016 Red Bull Illume Image Quest. LEARN FROM THE BEST: G-Technology G-TEAM members will be featured in the following G-Technology sponsored sessions. For the full seminar schedule, visit http://www.photoplusexpo.com/conference/conference-schedule.shtml . Lucas Gilman
Friday, Oct 23 – 11:00 AM to 11:30 AM ET
Topic: Maximizing Your Next Shoot
Lindsay Adler
Friday, Oct 23 - 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM ET
Topic: Body Beautiful- Lighting, Posing and Flattering the Human Form
Lou Freeman
Friday, Oct 23 - 4:30 PM to 6:30 PM
Topic: Modern Lite Creative Speed Lighting for Fashion, Glamour & Beauty Photography
Stay connected with G-Technology
Facebook®: G-Technology
Twitter: @GTechStorage
Instagram: GTechnology
YouTube®: GTechnologyStorage
About G-Technology
G-Technology is wholly owned by Western Digital Corporation. Founded in 1970, Western Digital Corporation, is an industry-leading developer and manufacturer of storage solutions that enable people to create, manage, experience and preserve digital content. Financial and investor information is available on the company's Investor Relations website at investor.wdc.com .
GTechnology external hard drives serve as an element of an overall backup strategy. It is recommended that users keep two or more copies of their most important files backed up or stored on separate devices or online services.
GTechnology, G-RAID and G-DRIVE are registered trademarks of Western Digital Corporation or its affiliates in the United States and/or other countries. Other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
